Web Developer - HTML/CSS
(Digital)

Codazen provides high-touch web development services to companies such as Facebook, Oculus, KBB, and others. We're looking to add to our team of highly skilled professionals. Are you passionate about building world-class websites using the latest technologies and techniques? Codazen is looking for a Web Developer who knows how to build and style responsive, cross-browser web page layouts.

Key Responsibilities


Able to hand-code HTML and CSS without using packaged web design software
Participate in agile software development process and code reviews
Implement responsive HTML layouts based on wireframes
Implement custom styling based on a style guide and/or design comps


Skills and Requirements


3+ years experience building web sites
Advanced skills with HTML and CSS
A passion for high quality UX and attention to detail
Knowledge of cross-browser and device compatibility issues and limitations
Experience with CSS media queries
Knowledge of CSS3 Transitions and Transformations
Experience with different image and video formats used to optimize page weight and performance


Pluses


Experience with Adobe Creative Suite
Knowledge and experience applying SEO best practices
Experience adding web page interactivity or API usage with JavaScript
General understanding of JavaScript frameworks and how they integrate into a web page
Experience with web page templating frameworks (e.g. Handlebars, React)
